snippet: The Conference Board said that its index of leading indicators increased 0.6 percent last month after declining 0.2 percent in March.
abstract: Conference Board says its index of leading indicators increased 0.6 percent in April, following decline of 0.2 percent in March; solid rise in economic measure was buoyed by sharp rise in home-building applications and better job market.
lead_paragraph: The Conference Board said that its index of leading indicators increased 0.6 percent last month after declining 0.2 percent in March.

headline.seo: Conference Board Offers Sign of Growth for Future
headline.main: Indicators Offer Signs of Growth for Future
headline.print_headline: Indicators Offer Signs Of Growth For Future
